name: 30 Second Life Lite
description:
Live your entire life, from birth to death, in 30 seconds. At every moment, your choices determine where your life will lead. Slack off as a white collar worker, and get laid off. If you work hard as a cat burglar, you'll become a criminal mastermind! Can you find the path to becoming a cyborg? A monk? A tycoon? A messiah? Because life's too long to live just once.

Try out the lite version so you can get a taste of the game! The lite version is a fully self-contained game, but the full version has more content.
